mapper.select: select resource_url, resource_method from sys_resource where resource_code = #{value} order by create_date asc
select resource_url, resource_method, auth_level from sys_resource order by auth_level desc

select t3.resource_url, t3.resource_method from sys_role_user t1 left join sys_role_menu t2 on t1.role_id = t2.role_id inner join sys_resource t3 on t2.menu_id = t3.resource_code where t1.user_id = #{userId}
